debiased.crossvalidation.scorers.fairness_binary_scorer module¶

class debiased.crossvalidation.scorers.fairness_binary_scorer.BinaryFairnessScorer(mitigating, discriminated, nclasses=2)¶

Bases: BinaryClfScorer

This class takes care of computing fairness metrics

Parameters:

Scorer (Scorer) – Inherits from Scorer

get_fairness_scores(y_true: list, y_pred: list, y_probs: list, demographics: list) → dict¶

Returns dictionary with as first level keys the metrics, and as second level keys the demographics.

Parameters:

  • y_true (list) – real labels

  • y_pred (list) – predicted labels (binary)

  • y_probs (list) – predicted labels (probability)

  • demographics (list) – corresponding demographics

  • metrics (list) – metrics to compute the scores for

Returns:

score:

demo0: value … demon: value

Return type:

results (dict)
